snippet: This year’s political advertising barrage is enough to shatter even Las Vegas-size notions of excess.
abstract: More political commercials have been broadcast in Las Vegas than anywhere else in the United States, giving city the dubious distinction of being the most saturated media market in the most expensive year in American politics; in presidential race alone, campaigns and their allies have reserved about $70 million in commercial time between Oct 15 and Election Day; of that, $5 million is just for Nevada and its six electoral votes.
lead_paragraph: This year’s political advertising barrage is enough to shatter even Las Vegas-size notions of excess.

headline.seo: Las Vegas Groans Under Heap of Campaign Ads
headline.main: 73,000 Political Ads Test Even a City of Excess
